title: Hinge Likes: How Many You Get, When Likes Reset, & More

steps.title: For a free Hinge account, you can send up to 8 likes each day.
steps.content: For a free Hinge account, you can send up to 8 likes each day. Your limit of 8 likes resets every day at 4:00 AM, local time. If you find yourself running out of likes, you can upgrade to HingeX or Hinge+ to get an unlimited number of likes. [2] X Research source You can receive up to 99 likes each day from other Hinge users, even with a free account. Use the Hinge algorithm in your favor to attract like-minded people!

steps.title: Comment on people's profiles.
steps.content: Comment on people's profiles. A comment on someone's story or profile is more likely to receive a response than just a like. If you send a comment, make sure you edit it for correct grammar and that the comment is profile-specific. No one wants to see a general comment that you leave for everyone, which will most likely not garner a response.

steps.title: Make sure the pictures you're using are updated.
steps.content: Make sure the pictures you're using are updated. For good profile pictures , make sure your face is visible in at least a few if not all of them. Choose photos that show off your hobbies or interests, if possible. Here are some tips for the photos you upload to Hinge: The first photo, which is displayed as your profile picture, must clearly show your face, which means no glasses or hats. Use recent, updated photos. Wear something more formal or dressed up for at least one photo. Show off your sporty side (if you have one) in another photo. Wear different clothes in each picture. Don't upload a bunch of pictures that include you and other people.

steps.title: Put in the work.
steps.content: Put in the work. Put in the work to get results, such as sending all 8 likes per day, each with a personalized comment, and you're more likely to get responses.

steps.title: Update your profile.
steps.content: Update your profile. Maybe your profile is coming off as unauthentic and fake, so spend some time on it to improve it. All the prompts on Hinge change monthly, so update them as often to keep your profile fresh.

steps.title: Upgrade your Hinge account.
steps.content: Upgrade your Hinge account. A premium account costs more, but it also offers better results. In addition to getting more likes to give out each day, you can also see your Hinge Standouts .
